algorithm

类 TCR

  • java.lang.Object
    • datamodel.RatingSystem2DBoolean
      • algorithm.MF2DBoolean
        • algorithm.MF2DBooleanIncremental
          • algorithm.TCR

  • public class TCR
extends MF2DBooleanIncremental
    The main algorithm for three-way conversational recommendation.
    Project: Three-way conversational recommendation.
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Fan Min
    www.fansmale.com, github.com/fansmale/TCR.
    Email: minfan@swpu.edu.cn, minfanphd@163.com.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static double BOUNDARY_VARIATION
      Add the variation to the boundaries during data transferring to avoid NaN.
      (专用程序包) double[][] costMatrix
      The cost matrix.
      (专用程序包) boolean[] currentUserPromotions
      The promotion list for the current user.

      The recommendation list for the current user.

      The default recommendation list length.

      The default recommendation ratio.

      Item predicted rating no less than the second value may be recommended, no less than the first value may be promoted.

      The like threshold.

      The maturity value for each item.

      Promote.

      Recommend.

      The recommendation list length for each round.
      (专用程序包) double recommendationRatio
      Some items are recommended, while others are promoted.

      The statistics information (NN, NP, BN, ...) for current user.
      (专用程序包) int[] semiPopItems
      The semi-popular items (for recommend).

    • 字段详细资料

      • costMatrix

        double[][] costMatrix
        The cost matrix.

      • maturityValueArray

        double[] maturityValueArray
        The maturity value array. For each recommendation to existing rating, the maturity increases by 5. For each recommendation to non-existing rating, the maturity increases by 2.5. For each promotion to existing rating, the maturity increases by 4. For each promotion to non-existing rating, the maturity increases by 2.

      • DEFAULT_RECOMMENDATION_LENGTH

        public static final int DEFAULT_RECOMMENDATION_LENGTH
        The default recommendation list length.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • recommendationLength

        int recommendationLength
        The recommendation list length for each round.

      • recommendationRatio

        double recommendationRatio
        Some items are recommended, while others are promoted.

      • DEFAULT_RECOMMENDATION_RATIO

        public static final double DEFAULT_RECOMMENDATION_RATIO
        The default recommendation ratio.
        另请参阅:

      • maturityForEachItem

        double maturityForEachItem
        The maturity value for each item.

      • currentUserRecommendations

        boolean[] currentUserRecommendations
        The recommendation list for the current user.

      • currentUserPromotions

        boolean[] currentUserPromotions
        The promotion list for the current user.

      • maxItemPop

        int maxItemPop
        The maximum of item pop.

      • popularityThresholds

        double[] popularityThresholds
        Item popularity no less than the second value may be recommended, no less than the first value may be promoted.

      • favoriteThresholds

        double[] favoriteThresholds
        Item predicted rating no less than the second value may be recommended, no less than the first value may be promoted.

      • popItems

        int[] popItems
        The popular items (for recommend).

        int[] semiPopItems
        The semi-popular items (for recommend).

        Neighborhood radius.

        int[][] recommendationStatistics
        The statistics information (NN, NP, BN, ...) for current user.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • TCR

        public TCR(java.lang.String paraFilename,
           int paraNumUsers,
           int paraNumItems,
           int paraNumRatings,
           double paraRatingLowerBound,
           double paraRatingUpperBound)
        The constructor.
        参数:
        paraFilename - The rating filename.
        paraNumUsers - The number of users.
        paraNumItems - The number of items.
        paraNumRatings - The number of ratings.
        paraRatingLowerBound - The lower bound of ratings.
        paraRatingUpperBound - The upper bound of ratings.

      • computeTotalCostForUser

        public double computeTotalCostForUser(int paraUser)
        Compute the total cost for a user.
        参数:
        paraUser - The index of the given user.
        paraRecommendations - The recommendations to the user, true for recommendation.
        paraPromotions - The promotions for the user, true for promotion.
        返回:
        The total cost for the user.

      • computeTotalCostForUser

        public double computeTotalCostForUser(int paraUser,
                                      boolean[] paraRecommendations,
                                      boolean[] paraPromotions)
        Compute the total cost for a user.
        参数:
        paraUser - The index of the given user.
        paraRecommendations - The recommendations to the user, true for recommendation.
        paraPromotions - The promotions for the user, true for promotion.
        返回:
        The total cost for the user.

      • computeUserRecommendationStatitics

        public int[][] computeUserRecommendationStatitics(int paraUser)
        Compute recommendation statistics for a user.
        参数:
        paraUser - The index of the given user.
        返回:
        The recommendation statistics for the user.

      • leaveUserOutRecommend

        public double leaveUserOutRecommend()
        Leave-user-out recommendation.
        返回:
        The total cost of the current user.

      • recommendForUser

        public double recommendForUser(int paraUser)
        Recommend for one user.
        参数:
        paraUser - The user index.
        返回:
        The total cost of the current user.

      • popBasedRecommend

        public void popBasedRecommend(int paraUser)
        Pop-based recommendation. With member variables currentUserRecommendations and currentUserPromotions, there is no need to return.
        参数:
        paraUser - The given user.

      • mfBasedRecommend

        public void mfBasedRecommend(int paraUser)
        MF-based recommendation. With member variables currentUserRecommendations and currentUserPromotions, there is no need to return.
        参数:
        paraUser - The given user.

      • randomSelectFromArray

        public static int[] randomSelectFromArray(int[] paraArray,
                                          int paraValidLength,
                                          int paraNumSelection)
        Randomly select some elements from the given array.
        参数:
        paraArray - The given array.
        paraValidLength - Valid length of the array.
        paraNumSelection - The number of selected elements.

      • eliminateProcessed

        public static int[] eliminateProcessed(int[] paraArray,
                                       boolean[] paraProcessed)
        Eliminate elements that are already processed.
        参数:
        paraArray - The given array.
        paraProcessed - Indicate which elements have been processed.
        返回:
        The new array.

      • computeUserMaturity

        public double computeUserMaturity(int paraUser,
                                  boolean[] paraRecommendations,
                                  boolean[] paraPromotions)
        Compute the user maturity increment. For each recommendation to existing rating, the maturity increases by 5. For each recommendation to non-existing rating, the maturity increases by 2.5. For each promotion to existing rating, the maturity increases by 4. For each promotion to non-existing rating, the maturity increases by 2.
        参数:
        paraUser - The given user.
        paraRecommendations - The recommendation array.
        paraPromotions - The promotion array.

      • run

        public void run()
        The main entrance.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.NumberFormatException

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main entrance.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.NumberFormatException
